values.fullName: Additional parts to be ordered %28not an acceptable delay for OOOOa inspections%29
Repair would be unsafe during operation of the unit%7CRepair is technically infeasible
Shutdown%2FBlowdown of equipment required to complete repair and emissions from repair would be greater than the leak itself
Discuss confined space entry safe work practice
Prohibit mobile engines near confined spaces
Hard%2C not malleable and unable to form together if in small chunks
Medium%2C malleable and able to hold form
Soft%2C runny and unable to hold form
Use lifting equipment to raise tools to or from the work platform
Use signs and barriers to restrict entry or access underwork at elevation
Vessel - Process and Treatment %28Heater Treaters%2FTesters%29%7CVessel - Miscellaneous Other
Use correct tools and equipment for task
Have an excavation plan or safe work practice
Locate underground pipes or cables by hand digging
Implement health hazard controls %28Lead%2C Asbestos%2C Benzene%2C H2S%2C Iron Sulfide%2C Sulfur Dioxide%2C NORM%29
Discharge equipment and make electrically dead
Observe safe work distances for live cables
Restrict access to authorized personnel only
Use insulated gloves%2C tools%2C and mats%2C GFCI%E2%80%99s%2E
Provide or use suitable communication techniques
Bond or earth for static electricity for cathodic protection
Provide firefighting equipment and fire watch
Remove%2C isolate%2C or contain combustible materials
Confirm lifting equipment condition and certification
Have a documented and approved lift plan
Obtain approval for lifts over processing equipment
Confirm stability of load and work platform
Get assistance or mechanical aid to avoid pinch points
Implement controls on users or access
Limit and monitor proximity to live equipment on users or access
Do not work in the line of fire
Observer to monitor proximity of people and equipment
Shut down or lock out equipment
Perform induction or training for new workers
Heavy paraffin%3A all ribs are full of paraffin and at least 5 gallons of paraffin in front of it
Light paraffin%3A 1 rib is full of paraffin with no paraffin in front of the pig
Moderate paraffin%3A 2 to 3 ribs are full of paraffin and at least 2 gallons in front of it
No paraffin%3A absolutely no paraffin on the pig or in front of the pig
Know distance from poles and other equipment while driving
Wait or defer until visibility improves
Inspect equipment and tools for condition and test date currency
Protect electrical leads from impact or damage
Have spill cleanup materials and equipment on hand
Restrain and isolate hoses when not in use
Do not work in the line of fire
Perform isolation %E2%80%93 LOTO%2C blinding or defeat
Have permit signed by leader of affected groups
MOC required for deviation from SIMOPS restrictions
Use barriers and signs to segregate activities
Barricade or rope off openings and holes
Identify and shield uneven surface or projections
Secure or cover cables%2C cords%2C and tubing
Treatment Type%3A Single Pig- Chemical in the Front
Discuss working at heights safe work practice
Locking type snaphooks must be used
Verify fall restraint and arrest equipment certification
